body_text.section: Spillover of Swine Coronaviruses, United States

body_text.text: Serum samples from 7,997 feral swine removed as part of permitted wildlife damage management activities were collected across the United States (Technical Appendix Table 1) during Feral swine samples were screened using a whole-virus PEDV ELISA (1, 2

BIBREF0.title: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV) detection and antibody response in commercial growing pigs

FIGREF0.text: September 2015. This covers both the time period before porcine epidemic virus (PEDV) was first detected in US domestic swine and the initial rapid spread of the virus in domestic swine facilities. Samples were collected throughout the entirety of the range of breeding feral swine populations and in both domestic swine PEDV-positive and PEDV-negative states.

FIGREF1.text: PEDV, porcine epidemic virus. Technical Appendix Table 2. Feral swine samples sizes by yea,
